A8X.F.summary: Fiskars Oyj Abp manufactures and markets consumer products in Europe, the Americas, and the Asia Pacific. The company operates through four segments: Vita, Terra, Crea, and Other. It offers tableware, drinkware, and interior products under the Iittala, Royal Copenhagen, Waterford, and Wedgwood brands; gardening, watering, and outdoor products under the Fiskars, Gerber, and Gilmour brands; and scissors, and creating and cooking products under the Fiskars brand. In addition, it develops, manages, and rents real estate properties; and sells timber. Fiskars Oyj Abp was founded in 1649 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
